description: Made for those who only have enough room in the van for one ski jacket and not enough time to get out of the backcountry to steal your friends' for the day. Designed with feedback in mind from our professional athletes, The Viv™ Gore-Tex Pro Jacket is the ultimate choice for any ski mountaineer who requires top-tier durability and toughness with all the expert-level functionality.
name: Mountain Hardwear The Viv GTX Pro Jacket - Mens
